subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Delfino scored 24 points, Chris Bosh had 21 and the host Toronto Raptors eliminated the Nets from playoff contention Friday night with a 112-85 victory.
snippet: Carlos Delfino scored 24 points, Chris Bosh had 21 and the host Toronto Raptors eliminated the Nets from playoff contention Friday night with a 112-85 victory.
